definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
(lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
(old) three generations (father, self and sons)/three clans (your own, your mother's, your wife's)
blood relations/one's own flesh and blood/kin
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
remaining evil element/surviving members (of evil former regime)/dregs (of colonial administration)
